testcase.name: Pillow Purchase Using Credit Card
testcase.system-out: Given User is on home page..................................................passed When User clicks on checkout................................................passed When Selects payment option as Credit Card..................................passed Then Enters the credit card details "4811 1111 1111 1114", "03/20", "123" and bank's OTP "112233".passed Then Confirms the transaction status........................................passed
